messages.message:
would it make sense to put usage & billing on the same page? that way people can see both how much theyve used it & when they've spent money to top up again

def understand if we want to place them separately to abstract away the costs b/w their usage
similar feedback was also raised earlier today https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0516UPPMT3/p1685533724289429
The stop gap solution rn is we will be adding a link to the usage page from the billing page
We will def consider this feedback and improve for next release

Thanks for the feedback! We have a few ideas on what the future of billing / usage would look like. The current iteration is what was doable in the time :) 

@Siya @mfichman
